document_data.caption: A psaltery from [[Aurora's Emporium]].
document_data.name: Psaltery
document_data.mainbody: A '''psaltery''' was a stringed musical instrument, similar to a plucked [[dulcimer]].
document_data.Description:
Psalteries were popular in [[Interior Faerûn|central]] and [[northeast Faerûn]], among both peasants and nobility.

A variety of psalteries crafted by [[bard]]s from [[Selgaunt]] was available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.
